name: Dehydration
description:
A creature requires an amount of water per day based on its size. A creature that drinks less than half the required water must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or gain 1 Exhaustion level at the end of the day. A creature with access to even less water automatically gains 1 Exhaustion level.

### Water/Food Needs per Day

| Size | Water | Food |
|---|---|---|
| Tiny | 1/4 gallon | 1/4 pound |
| Small | 1 gallon | 1 pound |
| Medium | 1 gallon | 1 pound |
| Large | 4 gallons | 4 pounds |
| Huge | 16 gallons | 16 pounds |
| Gargantuan | 64 gallons | 64 pounds |
